header.description: This CyberArk plugin enables credentials/secrets retrieval from CyberArk Vault and Conjur

step-type.name: Get Password from Vault
step-type.description: Get Password using CyberArk AIM Credential Provider

property-ui.label: Path
property-ui.description: Full path to clipasswordsdk. E.g. /opt/CARKaim/sdk/clipasswordsdk

property-ui.label: Safe
property-ui.description: Safe name

property-ui.label: Folder
property-ui.description: Folder name

property-ui.label: Object
property-ui.description: Object name of the credential

property-ui.label: AppID
property-ui.description: AppID configured in CyberArk PVWA

property-ui.label: Ouput Property - Password
property-ui.description: Process Request Property for storing the retrieved password

property-ui.label: Ouput Property - User Name
property-ui.description: Process Request Property for storing the retrieved user name

property-ui.label: Ouput Property - Address
property-ui.description: Process Request Property for storing the retrieved address

property-ui.label: Process Request ID
property-ui.description: Property to reference the ID of the process request. This will either be a component process request or a generic process request.

property-ui.label: Process ID
property-ui.description: The ID of the generic process. If the requested process derived from a component process this property will be empty.
